item.title: addItem Help!
item.dc:creator: @TheMyth TheMyth
item.description:
@TheMyth wrote:

go into item.java or item4.java and go to the bottom, create one of the codes above and put your name for the randomgive and the item ids you want, then change your 1053 in additem to item.YOURRANDOMGIVE or item.4YOURRANDOMGIVE witchever 1 you made it in, this will make it randomly select one of those ids when it calls apon the code for using the item on that object
hope this helps

Read full topic

item.title: addItem Help!
item.dc:creator: @Rustyz Rustyz
item.description:
@Rustyz wrote:

if (UsedOnObjectID == 7316 && ItemID == 605) {
setAnimation(883);
animationReset = System.currentTimeMillis() + 1000;
deleteItem(605, 28);
addItem(1053, 1);
sendMessage(“You have Completed the Halloween Event I hope you like your reward.”);
}
